channel.title: Email Templates on The Things Stack for LoRaWAN Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Email Templates on The Things Stack for LoRaWAN Documentation

item.title: Available Templates
item.description: The following email templates are currently used by The Things Stack: Full Name Identifier Scope Additional fields API Key changed api_key_changed Sent when the rights of an API Key have been changed. Identifiers and Rights API Key created api_key_created Send when an API Key has been created. Identifiers and Rights Collaborator changed collaborator_changed Sent when the rights of a collaborator have been changed.

item.title: Overriding Templates
item.description: Note: We recommend getting familliar with the html/template template format first. Template components An email template override has three components: The subject file, which contains the subject of the email and is named <identifier>.subject.txt. The text contents file, which contains the contents of the email in text format and is named <identifier>.txt. The HTML contents file, which contains the contents of the email in HTML format and is named <identifier>.
